price: آيا د هغوى (مكې والو) لپاره دا يوه نښانه نه ده چې د بني اسرائيلو عالمان هم ورباندې پوهيږي.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
